//  OJ: 洛谷
//  提交ID: 190532607
//  题目ID: T543226
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
//#define ONLINE
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
int n, p[30], a[30], idx, idxx;
ll db[] = { 0,102605682,378170718,813364696,1402405583,2140377129,3025989707,4054033648,5227795139,6540205660,7994482781,9584914007,11307060300,13176990028,15176437668,17310634535,19582743661,21980035976,24514314668,27175200880,29983105047,32902998416,35965414959,39152220941,42465571579,45923700641,49495048929,53194847694,57029747984,60994731576,65068049712,69287818746,73639519875,78108464756,82693080580,87417115440,92251219693,97221252246,102308834265,107532566235,112867531228,118341718127,123943104235,129641239339,135479337528,141437812452,147511047353,153757649595,160112089945,166543954503,173122287432,179823473929,186628063245,193567312398,200597544882,207791381303,215138005875,222542997041,230110441584,237780213904,245544577257,253488851637,261494818473,269661114236,277902394644,286302272358,294823714941,303455789424,312211730247,321058082738,330077138821,339165737203,348388237315,357781581376,367215458386,376826040898,386526773233,396331824239,406324060281,416276599221,426514319206,436843774978,447241055728,457789197714,468408844866,479158459449,490073208092,501095148003,512173750497,523412248094,534742774636,546309470114,557831473168,569517930346,581327289517,593331425644,605452982186,617527957220,629817559321,642220649198,654783798187,667377750671,680149800428,692985929361,706056112413,719122063929,732390032620,745658746586,759112762225,772716434404,786321928260,800185085381,814129811551,828269611486,842361871021,856606895798,870965183351,885478883566,900010134214,914700423860,929537848253,944567011516,959613846794,974737580879,990045736362,1005480139125,1020991222920,1036588997561,1052352421372,1068373405512,1084334685528,1100426317688,1116617017446,1132960528014,1149440803385,1165883858266,1182618378734,1199441238852,1216367652898,1233295512752,1250360042004,1267480411227,1284803303643,1302290240241,1319843653996,1337686265764,1355464200456,1373330723756,1391450639611,1409613800867,1427924471181,1446232800237,1464682588895,1483374426165,1502090836468,1520876326807,1539925745769,1558919511300,1577961801381,1597192213795,1616550736854,1636084270467,1655870965516,1675594206594,1695412546752,1715284956892,1735295892300,1755554060489,1775875835052,1796292194570,1816660442935,1837358041856,1857956976559,1878888160627,1899836593777,1920878877575,1941957200644,1963427872166,1984912201312,2006434895964,2028017661277,2049800906793,2071753361317,2093602901172,2115629150868,2137948222778,2160131893630,2182488128456,2205020476130,2227766528091,2250482645634,2273377932948,2296248134548,2319282162187,2342446650323,2365787621849,2389417095999,2412862597341,2436488604660,2460278885935,2484319947071,2508152970535,2532262523299,2556473355163,2580808503330,2605110713249,2629699224518,2654438311197,2679058121821,2703969330319,2729061377501,2754117774839,2779245005921,2804539728398,2829879602982,2855403497281,2881131450967,2906915798916,2932733652823,2958702779544,2984724192673,3010864092434,3037086075362,3063574624448,3090157181464,3116666004934,3143511839959,3170225780272,3197328394364,3224414357589,3251536817227,3278614732055,3306027793002,3333578920261,3361235592731,3388815840224,3416735762551,3444778162996,3472874734539,3501052151657,3529216855033,3557971110739,3586154539839,3614740921089,3643548431458,3672254839924,3701104887239,3730246431961,3759400648904,3788545224797,3817895693973,3847488137993,3877242747706,3906916358124,3936779440776,3966481773918,3996481396507,4026833193108,4056952352993,4087407830689,4117802783391,4148499844200,4179118340678,4209938220387,4240797910042,4272057046111,4302981077660,4334123683162,4365421252394,4396912335894,4428375081538,4460224358808,4491965468726,4524109953467,4555925959485,4588382680958,4620684447081,4652744537864,4685263465061,4717639558730,4750316772856,4782979225852,4815895477711,4848719161356,4881789807832,4915043880625,4948306384836,4981792992863,5015144523540,5048869707541,5082813149756,5116550841476,5150450658488,5184426515819,5218445874053,5252880511366,5287329118901,5321739392137,5356532838780,5391203354608,5425902539230,5460629335817,5495719140133,5530831707163,5566089089515,5601430103615,5637123864827,5672645999987,5708434712727,5744352344301,5779960352209,5815981619340,5852151739643,5888368841005,5924744723002,5961161459936,5997748770166,6034153791505,6071075219266,6107788041978,6144655040788,6181684404902,6218711770402,6256470233973,6293666637405,6331301761406,6368759502934,6406724989928,6444459292020,6482411578154,6520307549244,6558299634070,6596545306941,6635125293789,6673813643940,6712133343974,6751018809400,6789844758608,6828466190620,6867475657176,6906569088805,6946183751000,6985446250101,7024878396548,7064420186763,7104171219756,7143736216253,7183821266888,7223687056718,7263717896722,7304058794650,7344782974695,7384735278581,7424955596627,7465912358786,7506432695954,7547585004607,7588657346316,7629645854377,7670764033171,7712192769093,7753213438380,7794687023425,7836097151945,7877952160363,7919395600531,7961492549281,8003285895226,8045409591458,8088077145581,8130610147902,8173035826403,8215448552731,8257753643520,8300800265238,8343948300876,8386633173840,8429555182405,8472765045222,8516263108250,8559264195478,8602782582405,8646385058285,8690023807317,8734216977022,8778310786465,8822463160332,8866732199491,8910594603085,8954906647528,8999644347828,9044019622758,9089255919491,9133947102344,9178501081186,9223469184851,9268339138587,9313496467522,9358723099226,9404292216257,9449716543325,9449716543325 };
signed main() {
#ifdef ONLINE
	freopen("divisor.in", "r", stdin);
	freopen("divisor.out", "w", stdout);
#endif
	cin.tie(0)->sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> n;
	ll anss = db[n / 25000];
	for (int x = n / 25000 * 25000 + 1; x <= n; ++x) {
		idx = 0;
		int tmp = x;
		ll suma = 1;
		for (int i = 2; i*i <= x; ++i)
			if (tmp % i == 0) {
				p[++idx] = i; a[idx] = 0;
				while (tmp % i == 0)
					tmp /= i, a[idx]++;
				suma *= a[idx] + 1;
			}
		if (tmp > 1) p[++idx] = tmp, a[idx] = 1, suma *= 2;
		if (idx == 1) {
			anss += 1ll * p[1] * (1ll * a[1] * (a[1] + 1ll) / 2);
			continue;
		}
		ll ans = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= idx; ++i) {
			ans += suma / (a[i] + 1) * (1ll * a[i] * (a[i] + 1ll) / 2) * p[i];
		}
		anss += ans;
		if (x % 25000 == 0) cout << anss << ',';
	}
	cout << anss << endl;
	return 0;
}
//|p|<=10,a_i<=25
//80pts plz
